question:
Consider the following statements about Green Climate Fund:
  1. It was established at 21st Conference of Parties (COP)held in Paris, France.
  2. It aims at mobilization of funds from developed countries to developing countries.
  3. It is governed by the GCF Board.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First Statement is wrong because GCF was established during COP 16 at Cancun, in Mexico, in the year 2010.COP 21 was held at Paris, in France, in the year 2015.
